forall l1 l2 : list A, length (l1 ++ l2) = length l1 + length l2

Related definitions and lemmas:
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
partition_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> length l = length l1 + length l2
list_length_ind : forall P : list A -> Prop, (forall l1 : list A, (forall l2 : list A, length l2 < length l1 -> P l2) -> P l1) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_length_induction : forall P : list A -> Type, (forall l1 : list A, (forall l2 : list A, length l2 < length l1 -> P l2) -> P l1) -> forall l : list A, P l
firstn_app_2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), firstn (length l1 + n) (l1 ++ l2) = l1 ++ firstn n l2
skipn_app : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), skipn n (l1 ++ l2) = skipn n l1 ++ skipn (n - length l1) l2
firstn_app : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), firstn n (l1 ++ l2) = firstn n l1 ++ firstn (n - length l1) l2
nth_split : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), n < length l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ nth n l d :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
concat_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list (list A)), concat (l1 ++ l2) = concat l1 ++ concat l2
Refl.make_conj_rapp : forall (A : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), Refl.make_conj eval (rev_append l1 l2) < -> Refl.make_conj eval (l1 ++ l2)
forallb_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l1 l2 : list A), forallb f (l1 ++ l2) = (forallb f l1 && forallb f l2)%bool
existsb_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l1 l2 : list A), existsb f (l1 ++ l2) = (existsb f l1 || existsb f l2)%bool
Refl.make_conj_app : forall (A : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), Refl.make_conj eval (l1 ++ l2) < -> Refl.make_conj eval l1 /\ Refl.make_conj eval l2
fold_right_app : forall (A B : Type) (g : B -> A -> A) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list B), fold_right g a (l1 ++ l2) = fold_right g (fold_right g a l2) l1
fold_left_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list B), fold_left f (l1 ++ l2) a = fold_left f l2 (fold_left f l1 a)
app_inv_tail : forall (A : Type) (l l1 l2 : list A), l1 ++ l = l2 ++ l -> l1 = l2
app_inv_head : forall (A : Type) (l l1 l2 : list A), l ++ l1 = l ++ l2 -> l1 = l2
Add_split : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ l2 /\ l' = l1 ++ a :: l2
in_ex_app : forall (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2
Forall2_app : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l1' l2' : list B), Forall2 R l1 l1' -> Forall2 R l2 l2' -> Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) (l1' ++ l2')
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2
Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l' : list B), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2' : list B, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2'
app_length : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), length (l ++ l') = length l + length l'
Add_app : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), Add a (l1 ++ l2) (l1 ++ a :: l2)
map_length : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), length (map f l) = length l
combine_split : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B), length l = length l' -> split (combine l l') = (l, l')
prod_length : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B), length (list_prod l l') = length l * length l'
rev_length : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), length (rev l) = length l
firstn_length_le : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat), n <= length l -> length (firstn n l) = n
